title: "Social Feeds"

::: panel-tabset
## Twitter

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(DT)
library("readxl")
twitter<- read_excel("D:/Research/ESG/ESG_website/data.xlsx", sheet = "twitter")
twitter$Date <- format(as.Date(as.character(twitter$Date)), "%Y-%m-%d")
datatable(twitter, options = list(pageLength = 5),escape=FALSE, class = 'cell-border stripe')
```
